programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson works with a young woman to help her remember the details and suspects in her rape; in order to learn a new witness interview technique, Rollins and Fin have to experience it for themselves.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A serial predator targeting men in gay bars proves difficult to catch, until a celebrity comes forward with his story.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins clashes with the parents of a teenage runaway; the squad comes together for a significant event.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives are spread thin when three major cases come in at midnight; Rollins and Carisi argue over an arrest.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU joins an under cover task force in busting a human trafficking ring.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins goes under cover to find a suspect who is drugging and assaulting tourists, while Benson helps the victims sort out their memories from their hallucinations.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The powerful family behind a retail empire defends one of its own from a bartender's rape accusation.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The cops get tangled in an elaborate online hoax that leads to the rape of a popular social media star; Benson sets new ground rules with Sheila.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Emotions run high as the squad embarks on a frantic search for Benson's missing son.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a popular fighter doesn't show up for the biggest bout of the year, Rollins and Velasco are drawn into a complicated web of secrets; McGrath confides in Benson.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A troubled teen (David Del Rio) is the first suspect when a money manager is found murdered in his loft, but a hidden video camera leads detectives to a star football player whose agent is willing to do almost anything to protect his client.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives suspect a wealthy family of coffee traders when a pregnant woman is found raped and murdered in her burned-out loft.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An abused foster child (Jae Head), apprehended while driving a runaway van, leads the detectives to re-examine a case involving a rape victim (Sara Gilbert).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A teen named Eric admits to looking at a Web site in an attempt to curb pedophilic urges toward his stepbrother; when Eric goes missing, the stepfather (Tom Noonan) is questioned.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the body of a 14-year-old girl is found in the Hudson River, Benson and Stabler think she was smuggled into the country by sex traffickers; in an attempt to identify her, Benson poses as a madam.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a young girl is kidnapped, Elliot Stabler must work with a recently paroled convict to get her back.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A former dancer (Carol Burnett) is caught up in the murder of a young couple.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a crime scene photo of a murdered teenage girl quickly becomes an Internet phenomenon, the police initiate an investigation with the victim's father, who points the detectives toward his daughter's therapist.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Following the deaths of three children, Fin realizes they were all "anchor babies" of immigrant families, and he reaches out to the Center of Immigrant Services.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler search for a man who is knowingly spreading HIV.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler speak to the daughter of a powerful couple who were found murdered in their bedroom.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A lesbian-rights activist (Kathy Griffin) claims a woman's death was the result of police neglect; when more women from the activist's group are attacked, it becomes clear that someone has a plan to bring down the group.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Several young prostitutes are found dead with homemade prayer cards attached to their bodies; Benson is forced to make a difficult decision.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman's murder leads Detectives Benson and Stabler to reopen an investigation into a similar crime committed 20 years earlier.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When an investigative journalist is found murdered in her bed, Cragen recognizes tactics from a similar case 30 years earlier.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler discover that a murder victim had been involved in the fight to expose questionable practices in the meat-packing industry.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Stabler's former partner (Sharon Stone) is put on the case when two young sisters are killed in a fire.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: With lives hanging in the balance, Harry is put to the test.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a pregnant rape victim disappears from the hospital, Benson and Stabler try to find her and obtain her statement.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Capt. Cragen begins a movement to catch a man who has raped three girls; after a rookie cop makes an arrest in the case, it is discovered the so-called rookie has some secrets.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A troubled teen (David Del Rio) is the first suspect when a money manager is found murdered in his loft, but a hidden video camera leads detectives to a star football player whose agent is willing to do almost anything to protect his client.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives suspect a wealthy family of coffee traders when a pregnant woman is found raped and murdered in her burned-out loft.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: When Cara Ryan shoots her ex-husband and accuses him of threatening to kill her, police question her motive.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: When Cara Ryan shoots her ex-husband and accuses him of threatening to kill her, police question her motive.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Sam and Hidoko are sent under cover after a cryptocurrency farm is robbed of over $10 million in bitcoin codes.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Callen, Sam and Nell must find pieces of a failed rocket launch, including a top-secret government device; Hetty tries to help Keane acclimate to life in the states.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team partners with the FBI when a Marine dies after being exposed to a rare nerve gas; Deeks shares his dream to quit law enforcement and open a bar.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a missing 5-year-old boy is found dead, suspicion falls on his unstable 13-year-old neighbor, whose mental problems began after he was abused at a camp recommended by the dead child's father.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler suspect the drug-dealing uncle of a girl (Shareeka Epps) found raped and beaten, but the theft of the rape kit identifying her attacker leads them to a crooked prison guard.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Elliot Stabler puts his marriage at risk when he goes under cover to gain access to an animal-smuggling ring, with Olivia posing as a prostitute.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler help a repeat rape victim (Jennifer Love Hewitt) stand up to her attacker; the investigation leads Benson to Los Angeles, where she meets a detective (Skeet Ulrich) with information that could help the victim get justice.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team must proceed with caution when an underage escort is found dead at a wild bachelor party with high-profile people in attendance; Brian Cassidy (Dean Winters), a former SVU detective who is working under, helps Benson and Amaro investigate.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The squad reels from the fallout of Capt. Cragen being arrested for the murder of an escort.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The investigation into Capt. Cragen and two warring escort services continues; Brian Cassidy's undercover work becomes increasingly difficult; Amaro struggles with the case and his marriage.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU detectives investigate after a school nurse notices multiple injuries on a young girl; Detective Amaro tries to bond with his recently discovered son.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Rollins hopes to elicit a confession from serial killer Gregory Yates (Dallas Roberts) when a body washes up on the beach where he buried victims, but the information he provides sends shock waves through the police department.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives continue to investigate a woman's murder and dismemberment by following a lead provided by serial killer Gregory Yates.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Erin Lindsay and Antonio Dawson from Chicago P.D. help SVU when two convicted murderers escape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A fellow detective asks the SVU for help when he suspects his two daughters are being groomed by a serial predator; Kat disobeys the captain's orders.
